sections.text:
19-4601. ORDER FOR PRODUCTION OF PRISONER. When it is necessary to have a person imprisoned in the state prison brought before any court, or a person imprisoned in a county jail brought before a court sitting in another county, an order for that purpose may be made by the court and executed by the sheriff of the county where it is made.

[(19-4601) Cr. Prac. 1864, sec. 669, p. 296; R.S., R.C., & C.L., sec. 8435; C.S., sec. 9350; I.C.A., sec. 19-4701.]
